body: Right, seeing that I've been asked multiple times in-game why was I demoted, I decided to make a thread about it. First off, obviously I was demoted. Did I deserve it? Yes. In recent weeks, I took my rank for granted, acted immature. I wasn't working at a high enough standard to be representing Avicus. For those who don't know, I was demoted for immaturity and rudeness. Right now I'm regretting it. If you didn't know already, I am MrExecutive_, I am extremely grateful for the chance to be able to serve Avicus with the background I had. And to blow it the way I did really hits me. People trusted me, forgave me and believed in me. Thank you for everything guys <3. (I'm not leaving Avicus) If you have any questions just post below.

Right now I'm regretting it. If you didn't know already, I am MrExecutive_, I am extremely grateful for the chance to be able to serve Avicus with the background I had. title: Regarding my demotion.

replies.body:
Thanks for your great service <3
p.s: ambi is mine

replies.body: Ooooo Santi Cazorla. You were one of my favourite mod </3 Still a legend though. ^-^

replies.body: I don't know what happened but I agree the incident on OCN was also immature but I have left it behind me and I believe in you, as I said on Skype. I would say you learned a lesson, don't f*ck it up when people count on you and you will do great :)

replies.body:
We all make stupid mistakes and if we never do make mistakes then how can we learn and improve ourselves? 
Been an absolute pleasure working with you buddy, hope to still see you around, Ambi <3

replies.body: Do I think you deserved it? Yes. The way you acted on TeamSpeak that time was below Moderator standard. Even when I told you to stop you continued. Putting that aside, I may be willing to forgive you if I see a change in attitude.
